alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:52PM CDT until June 16 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SIMPSON...SOUTHWESTERN SMITH...NORTHEASTERN LAWRENCE... NORTHERN COVINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 1052 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clem, or 11 miles north of Prentiss, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Clem around 1100 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
